title: What chapters have the highest weightage in VITEEE? - Quora
tags: Vellore Institute of Technology, Vellore Exams and Tests
Vellore Institute of Technology Engineering Entrance Examination (VITEEE)

response.answer_text: Organic Chemistry (whole) Physical chemistry Chemical kinetics Probability Integration Differential equations Differentiation Application of derivative Thermodynamics in physics Gravitation NOTE: go through the VIT brochure in which the syllabus is clearly mentioned. Most of the students study everything for the exam without knowing the syllabus and making their preparation less effective. Many difficult topics are not included in the syllabus like Ionic equilibrium and many more.

Organic Chemistry (whole) Physicsl chemistry Chemical kinetics Probability Integration Differential equations Differentiation Application of derivative Thermodynamics in physics Gravitation And lot more so study hard.
